Author: gghhddvv
Text: Thanks! What are the things that I shouldn't say, that you mentioned?

Author: phmwls
Text: I think it depends on the person, there’s not a universal sentence you can say, only a list of maybe-don’t-say-that lol I think the best approach would be to get to know the person. EDs can be incredible isolating and having someone to talk to, without the stress of it being about EDs or having to meet up or anything like that can be helpful. :)
